alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Cape Girardeau; Carter; Perry; Scott; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 25 at 6:36PM CST until November 26 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Areas of dense fog with visibilites dropping to one quarter of a mile or less. * WHERE...Across portions of southeast Missouri and southern Illinois. * WHEN...Starting this evening by 9 to 10 pm and lasting through early morning Saturday. * IMPACTS...Expect rapid changes to visibilities and areas of low visibility that will make travel difficult. Travelers on Interstate 55 in southeast Missouri, Interstate 57 in southeast Missouri and Southern Illinois, Interstate 24 in southern Illinois and Interstate 64 in southern Illinois should be alert for significant visibility reductions due to fog.
info.instruction: A Dense Fog Advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving...slow down... use your headlights...and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Bollinger; Cape Girardeau; Carter; Perry; Scott; Wayne
